channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Powerball’s $1.7B jackpot could make Christmas Eve unforgettable for a lucky winner
California farming magnate arrested in Arizona in wife's shooting death
item.description: A prominent California farmer was arrested in the shooting death of his estranged wife in a remote mountain community in Arizona, authorities said.

item.title: Trump plows ahead with construction plans as conservation group seeks limits

item.title: WATCH: Charity pleads for stolen toys for homeless children to be returned before Christmas
item.description: The toys were to be gifted to homeless and needy children in Long Island. Police are searching for the suspects.

item.title: What's open on Christmas Eve 2025? See which stores are operating.
item.description: Many businesses adjust their hours on Christmas Eve, so it's best to plan ahead if you need to do any last-minute shopping.

item.title: Ukrainian drones attack Moscow, Russia says, as Zelenskyy says Kyiv ready for deal
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said on Tuesday that he believes the U.S. "wants to reach a final agreement," to end the war in Ukraine.

item.title: Years before Epstein investigated in Fla., police got tip about Ghislaine Maxwell

item.title: What is the silver price forecast for 2026?
item.description: Experts expect silver prices to shift further in 2026 as demand and inflation further impact precious metal prices.

item.title: What is the home equity loan interest rate forecast for 2026?
item.description: There could be a shift in home equity rates in the new year. Here's what experts say could happen in 2026.

item.title: WATCH: Alabama football player brings Christmas joy to local children
item.description: Crimson Tide center Parker Brailsford used money from his (NIL) name, image and likeness deal to give 10 kids a brighter Christmas.

item.title: An American Dream at risk: What happens to a small Nebraska town when 3,200 workers lose their jobs
